data.comment: The big names in today's match at Carrow Road have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 44, Emiliano Buendia is booked for the home team.
The first-half is over at Carrow Road.
Stuart Attwell has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 52, Norwich have been given a penalty at Carrow Road...
Norwich are awarded a penalty ... Teemu Pukki botches the spot kick!
Christoph Zimmermann (Norwich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 57, Adam Idah is replacing Onel Hernandez for Norwich at Carrow Road.
The away team have replaced Duane Holmes with Morgan Whittaker. This is the first substitution made today by Phillip Cocu.
Mario Vrancic is on a sub for Marco Stiepermann for Norwich.
In the minute 79, Graeme Shinnie (Derby County) gets a yellow card.
At Carrow Road, Jason Knight has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Phillip Cocu (Derby County) is making a second substitution, with Max Bird replacing Kamil Jozwiak.
In the minute 84, Norwich make their third substitution with Jordan Hugill replacing Emiliano Buendia.
Lukas Rupp (Norwich) has received a first yellow card.
Wayne Rooney scores to make it 0-1 at Carrow Road.
In the minute 88, Phillip Cocu is making the team's third substitution at Carrow Road with Jack Marriott replacing Wayne Rooney.
That's full-time at Carrow Road. The final score is 0-1.
